name: Childhood's RUSH
description:
Set in a tranquil town built upon a sealed ruin, a nostalgic adventure drama unfolds by children!

* Synopsis
Blue is a young boy who has moved to a rural town from the city.
Growing frustrated with the dull country life, he explores the outskirts of town when suddenly a stone monument opens with a mysterious power, revealing a girl named Lava.
With a mysterious weapon given by the girl, Blue heads towards the ruins connected underground from the stone monument.
Will he be able to unlock the secrets that sleep within the ruins...?!

* Level Up with Defeating Enemies!
As you level up, you can select one ability out of three.
Find the best combination of abilities to efficiently conquer the ruins!

---

Estimated Playtime: About 1 hour
